text: Related gripe: Once in the docs there is usually not easy to find a link to the actual package repo. I get very annoyed once I enter a package documentation via google and I cannot find a link to the package repo.

text: Oh, I didn’t see that <@U8JP5B9T2> griped about this earlier today and that was the original.
